page.title: 13THE RIFLE RANGE: GRAVESHAM
page.content: When we arrived at the{Denton Rifle {Range}we had a look at all the targets which are used for practice. We saw a flag which was down. It meant that soldiers were not firing that day and so it was safe to visit. Then we set off in groups of 3 - 5. We found most interesting things, like dragonfly larvae and mating moths. We saw machines which lifted the targets upwards so the soldiers can shoot at them. The targets look like men. The soldiers pretend that they are their enemies and they fire at them. The used targets all had holes in them. The Warden, Alan said that the bullets could travel up to four miles. We found some used bullets and took them to our group leader to make sure they were not live! {YELLOW CLASS
